div1.p: In the Distric Court of the United States for the Western District of Washington Northern Division
In re Albert H. Young, Habeas Corpus. No. 2682
Filed 190 Witness my hand and official seal this 12th day of March, 1915.
In the matter of the Petition of Habeas Corpus of Albert H. Young, et. al.

Now on this day this cause comes on for hearing, H. A. Meyers and R.W. McClellan appearing for Petitioners, and George P. Fishburn, appearing for the United States, this being the return day on the show cause order heretofore issued herein, the hearing proceeds by the argument of respective counsel and the Court takes the said matter under advisement. The counsel for Respondent is to submit this week, answering brief to be filed next week, and reply brief by the end of next week.
